Description:
IN served - You have failed to ensure that the risk from fire and/or explosion, caused by the use of Xylene containing paints which may form a flammable atmosphere, is eliminated or reduced so far is as reasonably practicable because the electrical equipment in your paint storage and spraying areas is not appropriately rated.

IN served - You have failed to make arrangements for the effective management of health and safety which are appropriate to your activities, namely you have failed to control, monitor and review the use of Respiratory Protective Equipment at your premises, in use by your employees.
